channel.title: Thieving [317]
channel.description:
ok, i made these thieving stalls you steal from then sell the items to my shop for, cassh.
And You Steal Red Topaz's and try to sell to shop it says cannot sell red topaz to shop.
how do i fix it so i can sell the topaz to the shop?
thanks

item.title: Thieving [317]
item.dc:creator: @Fishy_Skillz Fishy Skillz
item.description:
@Fishy_Skillz wrote:

how? i never changed the rights to a shop…

Read full topic

item.title: Thieving [317]
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“Fishy Skillz, post:1, topic:349038”]ok, i made these thieving stalls you steal from then sell the items to my shop for, cassh.

And You Steal Red Topaz’s and try to sell to shop it says cannot sell red topaz to shop.

how do i fix it so i can sell the topaz to the shop?

thanks[/quote]
The shop is set to not buy items.
Not hard to fix, change the shop rights.
